title: MeshMagic 3D Free 3D Modeling Software [Download]
description: Viewing and editing STL files, 3D renderings and 3D files has never been easier.
Import STL files created with CAD and drafting software.
Use our 3D modelling software to rotate and rescale existing meshes.

Easily expand simple 2D outlines into 3D renderings. Working with 3D files using MeshMagic free 3D modelling software is intuitive. Quickly draw a 2D design and expand it to a 3D mesh or import an existing STL file and modify it.PC
